name: MMD Girls VR
description:
You can choose one of locations full of girls, and admire their beautiful movement in the dance. All girls love to dance, see how beautiful they can move. You can play on PC or VR both. Experience amazing moments in Virtual Reality using HTC Vive or Oculus Rift!
Locations:
  • Flower Room
  • Lantern Bridge
Features
  • MMD Girls
  • Unique Music
  • Visiting the VR Scene
  • Girls Model
  • Game designed for HTC Vive or Oculus Rift
  • and Many more...
